非専門家向け用語名称: 脱腸：おなかの中の臓器（多くは小腸）が鼠径管を通って足の付根へ飛び出してそけい部の膨らみを生じている状態
term textual description: Protrusion of the contents of the abdominal cavity through the inguinal canal.

非専門家向け用語名称: 背が高い：年齢や性別の標準に比べて身長が高い
term textual description: A height above that which is expected according to age and gender norms.

非専門家向け用語名称: 口の中の天井に相当する口蓋が裂けている状態
term textual description: Cleft palate is a developmental defect of the `palate` (FMA:54549) resulting from a failure of fusion of the palatine processes and manifesting as a separation of the roof of the mouth (soft and hard palate).

非専門家向け用語名称: 口の中の天井に相当する口蓋の幅が、標準より狭い状態（たとえば-２SD（標準偏差）以上、あるいは明らかに狭い状態）
term textual description: Width of the palate more than 2 SD below the mean (objective) or apparently decreased palatal width (subjective).

非専門家向け用語名称: 割れたのどちんこ：口蓋垂(のどちんこ)が先端から二つに割れている状態

非専門家向け用語名称: 口の中の天井に相当する口蓋の高さが標準より高い状態（２SD（標準偏差)以上高いか、第一永久臼歯のあたりの口蓋の高さがその臼歯の高さの2倍以上の状態）
term textual description: Height of the palate more than 2 SD above the mean (objective) or palatal height at the level of the first permanent molar more than twice the height of the teeth (subjective).

非専門家向け用語名称: 脳脊髄液が増加して脳室(脳実質の外側の通常は少量の液体のある空間）が拡がり、そのために脳(実質）が圧迫されている状態

term textual description: An ecchymosis (bruise) refers to the skin discoloration caused by the escape of blood into the tissues from ruptured blood vessels. This term refers to an abnormally increased susceptibility to bruising. The corresponding phenotypic abnormality is generally elicited on medical history as a report of frequent ecchymoses or bruising without adequate trauma.
